# Libraries
```{r}
library(tidycensus)
library(bayesrules)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Tidycensus
```{r}
v16 <- load_variables(2016, "acs5", cache = TRUE)
v16
```

```{r}
snap_2023 <- get_acs(
  geography = "state", 
  table = "B22001", 
  survey = "acs1",
  year = 2023,
  output = "wide"
)
```
```{r}
hi_snap_2020_acs5 <-get_acs(
  geography = "county",
  state = "Hawaii",
  variables = c(medinc = "B19013_001",
                medage = "B01002_001"),
  year = 2020
)
```
```{r}
snap_2023 <- get_acs(
  geography = "state",
  state = "Hawaii",
  table = "S2201", 
  survey = "acs1",
  year = 2023
)
```
```{r}
v23 <- load_variables(2022, "acs5", cache = TRUE)
```

```{r}
hi_snap_2022_acs5 <- get_acs(
  state = "HI",
  county = "Honolulu",
  geography = "tract",
  variables = "B99221_001",
  geometry = TRUE,
  year = 2022
)
```

```{r}
hi_snap_2022_acs5 %>%
  ggplot(aes(fill = estimate)) + 
  geom_sf(color = NA) + 
  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "magma") +
  coord_sf(xlim = c(-158.3, -157.6), ylim = c(21.2, 21.8))

```
